page.title: 01OVERVIEW OF AREA
page.content: OUR AREA IS COMPLETELY RURAL,THERE ARE SEVERAL FARMS BUT NO ACTUAL VILLAGES OR ESTATES OF HOUSES.MOST OF THE FARMS ARE SMALL,WORKED ONLY BY THE OWNER OR TENANT AND HIS FAMILY.MANY CROPS ARE GROWN,RANGING FROM OLD ONES LIKE CORN BARLEY AND OATS TO THE NEW OILSEED RAPE WHICH IS RESPONSIBLE FOR THE BRIGHT YELLOW COLOUR OF OUR COUNTRY- SIDE IN SPRING. THERE ARE SEVERAL SMALL BUSINESSES, RANGING FROM FARM TO DRESS SHOPS,FROM PETROL STATION AND REPAIR BUSINESS TO A PLANT NURSERY.THERE ARE NO PUBS,GROCERY SHOPS OR RECREATIONAL FACILITIES,APART FROM ONE MUSEUM, HUNDAY,WHICH DEALS WITH FARMING.THE AREA HAS A PREP SCHOOL,MOWDEN HALL, WHICH CATERS FOR 116 BOYS AND GIRLS,MOST OF WHOM BOARD.THERE IS ALSO A CHILDRENS HOME IN WHICH 50 CHILDREN LIVE.
